entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few rain showers. Rain showers or a few flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 8:20 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:20 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:20 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
